Html: I just installed rawr and checking my gear and gems i get see that if gem with 12 intelect instead of 26 heal i would get more hps out of my t6 helmet but all the spells have higher output. Why should i change my bracing diamond to incitefull?

The insightful metagem gives a higher mana-pool (from int) and gives mana-regen from casting spells. The added mana can be used to cast bigger heals (better heal/sec), which results in a higher throughput.
If you can meet the metagem requirement it's better than bracing.
